text: Great food. East access.

name: William Symington
text: perfect place when you just wanna chill great pizza perfect for birthdays.

name: Jason Nunez
text: Pizza Hut delivered on quality tonight. Definitely a better improvement since we ordered from them last.

name: Randy Knox
text: I went to this Pizza Hut it had dine in. I ordered my pizza hand toss with extra cheese,the young lady didn't know how to add extra cheese on the cash register, didn't know how to enter cash. When I got my pizza it had no extra cheese, and …More

name: Levi Dowdy
text: I order regularly and about a month ago service has went down! Pizza is never all the way cut tonight our pizza was a mess looked like they shook the box crazy before delivering! Thinking I'll be looking for a new place to order

name: xXxTRIBUTExXx
text: Spent $19.00 on 2 orders of boneless chicken wing's. Food was fine but when I asked the manager *some short guy with glasses* why I couldn't have a sack to carry the 5 different item's to my car, he said they were out of them and seemed to be very proud of the fact he was telling me he had nothing for me. I will not be going back.

name: Chris Flesner
text: Worst service from this location. I work close by and order from this location a couple times a month. Tonight when my order was messed up I was told their was nothing that could do about it but offer me a $5 credit to my account. I want …More

name: Wyatt Schulte
text: Wayyyyy better then the papa johns down the road by Sonic, the papa johns is trash do not eat there they will mess up you're order, and i am not a bot this is the cold hearted facts.

name: rpfeik
text: Terrible. If could give negative stars I would. Went there mid afternoon, and staff merely hung out in back and would not grace the registers with their presence. Why they didn't lock the door and go home I don't know.

name: Kim
text: I just ordered from here got Cinnabon cinnamon rolls with no icing when calling the store to speak to a manager they asked us if we ordered them without icing I don’t know who does that that’s ridiculous this place is trash

name: carol lee
text: The pizza was very good perhaps because I had not eaten pizza for quite a while.  The manager was very nice!

name: Ronda Bell
text: Better than Papa Johns, not as good as papa Murphy.

name: Gina Pounds
text: It was ok but not great. Took a while to get food and drinks and we got no plates or silverware to use for pizza we had to get bottles of pop because they had no glasses we was doing a eat in. I was real disappointed in it and the price was high and not worth it.

name: Thad Newman
text: Picked up a large order for a business lunch. Store refused to give extra dipping sauce. Got to final destination and found hair in the garlic knots.  Wow, bye pizza hut .

name: Philip Birkey
text: Ordered pizza for the family today and we always dip our slices in the garlic sauce.  Well, not today, the garlic sauce was rancid and tasted awful.  We looked for an expiration date and there was none.  Called the store and told them it …More

name: Elizabeth Przybylski
text: My husband and I ordered delivery from this location this past weekend. The delivery guy was friendly and fast. The pizza was delicious and nothing was messed up in the order. …More

name: Valerie Rose
text: I'm going with a 3 on this visit.  The website is harder to use than it should be.  PH really needs to add some flexibility at checkout to change location and delivery options.  It's long overdue.  In this visit I tried to order from one …More

name: Charles Blake
text: I just moved here and this is a great Pizza hut. The service was great. The girls were so nice and friendly. Ordered pasta and it was really good. Great job and Thank you...

name: Terry Coleman
text: I miss the good ole greasy pizza they used to have many years ago. It's still good. The girl working at the counter was very nice

name: Howard Wisdom
text: Did dine on. Food  ame out in a tomely manner. Food was good.

name: ku_delly
text: Well i ordered my food, got half of what i order (my pizza was cold and my cinnamon rolls was not iced )and i paid 25.66 for it and they took for ever. Now they are closed, i ordered off the 5 for 5 menu

name: Elizabeth Przybylski
text: Service can be hit or miss. Loved the cheese pizza they had on special yesterday, for National Cheese month!

name: krystal zamora
text: You never know how blessed you are to have a good Pizza Hut until you move and have to deal with a crappy one. Ordered from liberty Pizza Hut for years and never had to complain. Once. Thank you for providing good pizza and good customer service!!

name: ryan faul
text: your standard issue pizza hut, they usually get the order right and the pizza is prepared better than many other pizza huts.

name: Bradley Payne
text: The pizza was good but the estimated wait was about 20 minutes off. Also the lobby was torn apart with nowhere to sit and eat.

name: Justin Myers
text: Since thousands of homes in my area became excluded from the Crossroads location delivery range we've found that Minsky's, Dominos and Papa John's are all great Friday night options! And they love accepting our payments when delivering pizza to us. Brilliant!

name: Aiden Zahnd
text: i got scammed out of a pizza

name: Donald Bryant
text: I came to pick up my order. The cashier dropped the pasta dish on  the ground - NO BIG DEAL, things happen. She apologized no less than 10 times. She was on it, got another pasta dish going and put my pizza back in the warmer and gave me a credit for my next order. I was out the door 7 minutes later.

name: Laura Kempton
text: This place is right down the road and it always has a short wait time.  Any time I go here the staff is always friendly and customer oriented.  Ordering by phone is convenient because they keep track of previous orders and know just what I want.  Online ordering is convenient as well, but that goes without saying.

name: Sean Mahoney
text: Wrong order delivered and manager said instead of refunding my card I would get an account credit that never materialized.  Looks like Father Johnson's from now on.

name: M Allen
text: great American style pizza. the App is alot easier to use than the website and fun to try all the different options of crust types and flavors, varied sauces and of course great toppings! Allow more time on the weekends for your pizzas to be done cuz they get really busy!

name: connor risley
text: Whoever owns this store is incredibly cheap. The lack of a drinking fountain is absolutely rediculous for the prices charged at pizza hut. That alone warrents two stars. …More

name: Christopher Freeman
text: Good pizza pies made to order. Don't forget to ask for their daily coupons. What a bargain!

name: Francine Holmes
text: Walked inside around 11:00 Friday night. I was the only one placing an order. Placed an order for a large veggie pizza. Rep did not ask my name and did not notify me once the pizza was ready. I was there an hour before another employee …More

name: Heath Perkins
text: Friendly people.  Sometimes a little slow, but food usually good and orders usually correct.

name: Cyler Cobb
text: They will get your order right 50% of the time.

name: Carlene Carter
text: The staff is friendly, helpful, restaurants clean and fast service.

name: J Peckman
text: The guy at the counter was wonderful!

name: Greg Duncan
text: The food is consistently good following the Pizza Hut formula, but the systems are a mess and the staff struggles. Really not worth the extra time and frustration with every visit.

name: Michelle Johnson
text: Most times it's great some times crust isn't fully cooked

name: Andy
text: The building it self is a little run down and the location is sometimes difficult to get to. The people working seem nice enough and the food is good.

name: Kyle Rutliff
text: Ordered the pizza box twice. Each time there has been no sauces in the box. I thought the first time it was a fluke, but paying for extra cheese to begin with is stupid, and on top of it, I've never received any sauces.. laziness honestly.

name: Gavin Greenwood
text: Always get great service when I dine in. Great food and get the occasional good deal. Update: they no longer have fountain drinks. Which is hard with a 2 year old and they didn't have straws for our 2 litter and cups. My dining in here will be no longer.

name: Kimberly Sohn
text: They are fast friendly and it your order gets messed up they have no problem fixing it

name: Lisa Nimrick
text: Ordered pizza wings and mozzarella sticks....it was a Friday night so I knew it would be at least an hour to hour and half wait....no big deal but when it shows up and everything I ordered is COLD!!! I have a problem with it. Wont EVER use …More

name: Larry Collins
text: Great food

name: Tamikaze
text: Messed up the order and the medium pizza we got was very greasy. They did end up giving us a free desert for messing up our order, but the place was very messy and gross. There was a coackroach on the ground when we walked in. Food was alright, I'd just say go get little Cesears instead.

name: James Symmonds
text: It's a Pizza Hut. You get exactly what you would expect. It's some addictive stuff. Just be careful if you are ordering around a football game and allow extra time.

name: Coleman Cluckey
text: Past few times I order you don't deliver sauce when the website specifically says the breadstick or mozz sticks come with marinara. Dosapointed guys. Used to be a frequent customer and tipped rather well. But something change from then to this point. Ill jist drive to Gladstone for pizza from now on

text: Pizza Hut in Excelsior Springs very efficient good service and boy do I love their wings easy to get to it's right off of 69 Highway and between Lawson and Excelsior Springs Missouri

name: Jacob Becker
text: They stopped delivering to my neighborhood. I asked about it, they told me the area has just grown too fast, and they couldn't keep up. Understandable, I guess, but disappointing nonetheless.

text: I always try to give them the benefit of the doubt but many times they have screwed up when we order from there!! You would think I'd learn my lesson and stop ordering from them....well today I have!
